item.title: Meta’s answer to DeepSeek is here: Llama 4 launches with long context Scout and Maverick models, and 2T parameter Behemoth on the way!
item.description: While DeepSeek R1 and OpenAI o1 edge out Behemoth on a couple metrics, Llama 4 Behemoth remains highly competitive.

item.title: DeepSeek jolts AI industry: Why AI’s next leap may not come from more data, but more compute at inference
item.description: To contextualize DeepSeek’s disruption, let's consider the broader shift in AI being driven by the scarcity of training data.

item.title: Genspark’s Super Agent ups the ante in the general AI agent race

item.title: Cisco: Fine-tuned LLMs are now threat multipliers—22x more likely to go rogue
item.description: Cisco warns LLMs fine-tuned for business are now being weaponized. Guardrails aren't failing. They're being engineered around.

item.title: Vibe coding at enterprise scale: AI tools now tackle the full development lifecycle
item.description: Enterprise AI application development is moving forward with a new generation of vibe coding tools.
